title: The stop-motion animation of Guldies

images.alt: A handful of purplish clay cubes momentarily at rest

description: The claymation physics in “DISTORTION” are unlike anything I’ve ever seen, equal parts realistic and cartoonish.
image: ![A handful of purplish clay cubes momentarily at rest](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3238096/160290979-2ee94f07-1077-425d-8d5e-78f366b27673.jpeg)
